EmailTemplate.description: To be used when Customer is unable to be view any of the research entitlements
EmailTemplate.name: Markit Hub research content issue
EmailTemplate.subject: Markit Hub research content issue
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting Customer Care at IHS Markit.
The Markit Hub platform provides third-party unified access to multiple research providers, who are common customers with IHSMarkit. The content is managed direcly by each research provider and not by Markit Hub.
Therefore, please reach out to the support team at <Research Provider Company Name> by emailing the support team at <email address> who will be able to assist you.
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care
